column1: Prepared by: Demographic Analysis Section, BC Stats
Note: Figures from April 1, 1971 onwards contain estimates of Non-Permanent Residents and Returning Canadians while data before that does not.

This data incorporates the latest revisions by Statistics Canada and may not match the BC totals in the sub-provincial estimates published by BC Stats at https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/statistics/people-population-community/population.
